name: Herrera Esteli - Norteno - Short Corona Gorda
additionalNotes:
In 2011, Drew Estate hired Willy Herrera, the former cigar blender from Miami's miniscule but standout El Titan de Bronze factory. According to the company, the blend for Herrera Esteli was created in 2010 during Herrera's first visit to Drew Estate's cigar factory in Nicaragua, where he created three 
In 2016, Herrera enlisted his former coworkers at El Titan de Bronze to blend Herrera Esteli Miami, a line extension with a blend that differs substantially from the core brand.
